## EthersRmm class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Exposes all public functions of this library.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EthersRmm implements ReadableEthersRmm 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableEthersRmm](./rmm-ethers.readableethersrmm.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EthersRmm` class.
